item.title: LUNC News: Terra Classic Community Passes Four Monumental Burn and Staking Proposals | Coingape
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Four proposals related to increasing burn tax, LUNC burn, and staking were passed by the Terra Classic community. The proposals outline key changes including raising the LUNC burn tax to 0.5%, rewarding people for staking, whitelisting Dapps contracts, and increasing community pool funding. Fearing Binance withdrawing its LUNC burn mechanism, the community denied many proposals

item.title: Bankrupt Lender Celsius Network Withdraws $780M in Staked Ethereum | Coingape
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
